thread.title: Two Colorado zoos on new best U.S. zoos list
thread.title_full: Two Colorado zoos on new best U.S. zoos list

author: Ben Miller
title: Two Colorado zoos on new best U.S. zoos list
text:
Two Colorado zoos on new best U.S. zoos list Jul 23, 2015, 8:01am MDT Industries & Tags Mark Harden | Denver Business Journal A polar bear at Denver Zoo. Home of the Day Giraffes at the Cheyenne Mountain Zoo in Colorado Springs Two zoos in Colorado have been named on a list of the nation's top 25 zoos. According to a ranking of U.S. zoos by online travel company TripAdvisor.com, the Cheyenne Mountain Zoo in Colorado Springs ranks No. 6 in the U.S. and the Denver Zoo ranks No. 19. TripAdvisor commentators singled out the Cheyenne Mountain Zoo's giraffe viewing area as a zoo highlight. Last month, travel guide FodorsTravel.com rated the Denver Zoo is one of the top 10 zoos in the country. The top zoo in the country, according to TripAdvisor's rankings , was the San Diego Zoo in California. The Denver Zoo was partly responsible for tourism's banner year in Denver last year, when a total of 15.4 million people visited the area and spent $4.6 billion. Ben Miller contributes to the Denver Business Journal and compiles the Morning Edition email newsletter.
